title: The Walls-Mesoplanet Full Diamond & Tips Vid

replies.body: <u></u>I haven't played Walls so I might be wrong but am I correct to say the map is identical on all four sides? If so, I would count it as teamgriefing as you prevent your own team the possibility of enchanting like the three other teams are able to do (You kept the ench-table in your inventory). :)
replies.body_tagged: <u></u>I haven't played Walls so I might be wrong but am I correct to say the map is identical on all four sides? If so, I would count it as teamgriefing as you prevent your own team the possibility of enchanting like the three other teams are able to do (You kept the ench-table in your inventory). :)

replies.body: I believe this map is symmetrical so it should work on all four sides. However I don't play walls all that often
replies.body_tagged: I believe this map is symmetrical so it should work on all four sides. However I don't play walls all that often

replies.body:
no, it wouldn't be. Team griefing would be something like destroying your teams base they built and stuff like that. Plus if you watched the vid Youd see that my teammate left and I did put the enchant table down.

plus from my experience on the walls if you don't take it, someone else will. The difference is that I'll share it if someone asks for it while some other people won't.

plus you find this one in a chest lol so
